reviews.review: IT WAS WORTH WAITING 10 YEARS FOR. NOW WE ONLY HAVE TO WAIT ONE YEAR FOR AVENGERS 4 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
The best super heroes movie, nothing more to say

Una película extensa, que a pesar de mantenerte sentado durante varias horas está constantemente mostrando contenido interesante y correlacionado; es capaz de mantener interesado al público sin problema, maneja muchos escenarios al tiempo y muchos personajes, incluso introduciendo cierto trasfondo y cariño con varios de ellos, pero en ningún momento se siente desconectado o de contenido irrelevante para el cuerpo de la película. Me gustó la gran capacidad de manejar más de 10 superhéroes a la vez, escenarios y tramas con integridad, que suele ser un motivo negativo en la mayoría de los casos de otras películas similares, donde introducen tantos personajes que finalmente quedan desconectados o irrelevantes para la trama. La actuación de los actores es excelente, la banda sonora, los enemigos y los efectos visuales son extremadamente pulidos. 5/5.
I love this movie, so epic ...
I wish I had stayed home. I am never going to another Marvel movie.
Marvel bet to brought us their biggest bluckbuster ever, Infinity war is a movie full of surprises, if it was woth the wait.

Another chapter in the Avengers saga! Kept me interested throughout the entire show, however... if you were new to the series you would have been totally lost. At one point, a twist in the plot made one fellow movie goer literally throw his hands up and walk out! He should have waited though.... cliffhanger ending leaves you wanting more.
Disney just wants all my money.... with that ending they know they got me hooked to watch all the future marvel movie to see the fallout.

Avengers Infinity War is rock solid, action packed fun. The movie is full of action from the start with each superhero showing there ability and struggles that make them unique. The CGI is stunning and amazing especially in IMAX 3D.
Muy buena ancioso por ver la 4ta parte ya excelente.
